includedAssets.title: Back To The Future  (1985)
includedAssets.synopsis: Iconic time-travel fun as teen Michael J Fox, with the aid of eccentric scientist Christopher Lloyd, zaps back to 1955 to ensure his parents meet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Iconic time-travel fun as teen Michael J Fox, with the aid of eccentric scientist Christopher Lloyd, zaps back to 1955 to ensure his parents meet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Iconic time-travel fun as teen Michael J Fox, with the aid of eccentric scientist Christopher Lloyd, zaps back to 1955 to ensure his parents meet.

includedAssets.title: Back To The Future Part II
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael J Fox returns as Marty McFly who, aided by the eccentric Doc Brown, travels through time to save his future offspring.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael J Fox returns as Marty McFly who, aided by the eccentric Doc Brown, travels through time to save his future offspring.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael J Fox returns as Marty McFly who, aided by the eccentric Doc Brown, travels through time to save his future offspring.

includedAssets.title: Back To The Future Part III
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael J Fox's Marty McFly heads back through the ages to the Old West in order to rescue Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd) in the conclusion to the fantastic time travel trilogy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael J Fox goes back to the Old West for the conclusion of the fantastic time travel trilogy.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael J Fox's Marty McFly heads back through the ages to the Old West in order to rescue Doc Brown (Christopher Lloyd) in the conclusion to the fantastic time travel trilogy.

includedAssets.title: Back to the Future
includedAssets.synopsis: Michael J. Fox stars as Marty McFly, a rebellious teenager who uses a time machine, invented by genius physicist Dr. Emmett Brown (Christopher Lloyd), to travel to 1955, 2015 and 1885. Iconic time-travel fun.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Michael J. Fox stars as Marty McFly, a rebellious teenager who uses a time machine to travel to 1955, 2015 and 1885. Iconic time-travel fun.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Michael J. Fox stars as Marty McFly, a rebellious teenager who uses a time machine, invented by genius physicist Dr. Emmett Brown (Christopher Lloyd), to travel to 1955, 2015 and 1885. Iconic time-travel fun.

includedIn.title: Back to the Future
includedIn.synopsis: Rebellious teenager Marty McFly uses a time machine, invented by genius physicist Dr. Emmett Brown, to embark on adventures into the past and future.
